title: Microsoft Dynamics 365
__content: [Microsoft Dynamic 365](https://dynamics.microsoft.com/en-us/) empowers teamwork with dynamic and productive team sites for every project team, department, and division. Share files, data, news, and resources. Customize your site to streamline your teamâ€™s work. Collaborate effortlessly and securely with team members inside and outside your organization, across PCs, Macs, and mobile devices.
